form.label: Dashboards Links & Trusted Domains Overview
form.description: Overview of links used in Dashboards and the Trusted Domains configuration.

search.query: | rest splunk_server=local /services/properties/web-features/feature:dashboards_csp/enforce_dashboards_csp | eval value = if(value=="true", "Yes", "No") | table value

| rest splunk_server=local /services/configs/conf-web-features/feature:dashboards_csp | transpose | search column="dashboards_trusted_domain.*" | eval column = replace(column, "^dashboards_trusted_domain\.", "") | rename column as Name, "row 1" as Value

| rex field=eai:data max_match=0 "(action|href|src|code)=\"(?<href>.*?)\"" ``` Remove anchors and relative links ``` | eval href = mvfilter(match(href, "(?i)^\s*http[s]*")) | where isnotnull(href) AND href != "" | mvexpand href | eval [ | rest splunk_server=local /services/configs/conf-web-features/feature:dashboards_csp | transpose | search column="dashboards_trusted_domain.*" | eval value = "\s*" . replace('row 1', "\*", ".*") . ".*" | stats values(value) as allowed | eval allowed = "(?i)(" . mvjoin(allowed, "|") . ")" | return allowed ] | rex field=href max_match=0 "(?i)^\s*http[s]*\:\/\/(?<domain>.*?)(\/|$)" | eval isAllowed = if(match(href, allowed), "Yes", "No") | search isAllowed="No" | stats values(domain) as Domains | mvexpand Domains | sort Domains

| rex field=eai:data max_match=0 "(action|href|src|code)=\"(?<href>.*?)\"" ``` Remove anchors and relative links ``` | eval href = mvfilter(match(href, "(?i)^\s*http[s]*")) | where isnotnull(href) AND href != "" | mvexpand href | eval [ | rest splunk_server=local /services/configs/conf-web-features/feature:dashboards_csp | transpose | search column="dashboards_trusted_domain.*" | eval value = "\s*" . replace('row 1', "\*", ".*") . ".*" | stats values(value) as allowed | eval allowed = "(?i)(" . mvjoin(allowed, "|") . ")" | return allowed ] | rex field=href max_match=0 "(?i)^\s*http[s]*\:\/\/(?<domain>.*?)(\/|$)" | eval isAllowed = if(match(href, allowed), "Yes", "No") | stats dc(href) as links_count values(domain) as Domains values(href) as Links by author eai:appName title isAllowed | where links_count > 0 | sort eai:appName, title, isAllowed | rename author as Author, eai:appName as App, title as Dashboard, links_count as "Links #", isAllowed as "Is Allowed?" | $tokShowLinks$
